message: Hey there, I'm wondering if there is a way to change the sass output style - right now it's :nested, but I'd like to change this to :extended...any ideas?
Add the following to your config.rb: https://gist.github.com/1063776
I had success with this method: https://gist.github.com/1081489  I'm new to Ruby and middleman so please let me know if there is a better way to set the output style
That works for set it directly on the Compass config object instead: config.output_style = :expanded
